page.title: 02LANDSCAPE
page.content: ASHBRITTLE Ashbrittle is the only village in our block. There was a time when the village was larger. There used to be a grocery shop, a post office, a baker and a pub called the Antelope Inn. There was also a blacksmith and there were petrol pumps at the top of the village.These have all gone now. The village is situated on a hill and can only be approached by narrow twisting lanes. A few people commute to work from Ashbrittle; for example, the Headmaster of Milverton Primary School who lives in the village and Mr David who works in Taunton. Most people who live in Ashbrittle are involved in local farming. Ashbrittle is a small group of houses with a church and village hall.
